error.message: Class Drupal\Tests\token\Kernel\KernelTestBase not found and could not be autoloaded.
Class Drupal\Tests\token\Kernel\KernelTestBase not found and could not be autoloaded.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to block_access.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
